title: Amazon Sponsored Display Advertised Product Daily Report
description: Daily performance report for an Amazon Sponsored Display Advertised Product

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY', e.g., '13-10-2023'

Campaign_Name.description: Name of the campaign, e.g., 'COR | Global'

Ad_Group_Name.description: Name of the Ad Group, e.g., 'Global'

14_Day_Detail_Page_Views_DPV.description: Number of detail page views in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Orders.description: Number of total orders in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Units.description: Number of total units sold in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Sales.description: Details of total sales for the last 14 days

14_Day_New_to_brand_Orders.description: Number of new-to-brand orders in the last 14 days

14_Day_New_to_brand_Sales.description: Details of new-to-brand sales for the last 14 days

14_Day_New_to_brand_Units.description: Number of new-to-brand units sold in the last 14 days

Total_Return_on_Advertising_Spend_ROAS_C.description: Total return on advertising spend (ROAS) for click interactions

14_Day_Total_Orders_Click.description: Number of total orders from click interactions in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Units_Click.description: Number of total units sold from click interactions in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Sales_Click.description: Details of total sales from click interactions for the last 14 days

14_Day_New_to_brand_Orders_Click.description: Number of new-to-brand orders from click interactions in the last 14 days

14_Day_New_to_brand_Sales_Click.description: Details of new-to-brand sales from click interactions for the last 14 days

14_Day_New_to_brand_Units_Click.description: Number of new-to-brand units sold from click interactions in the last 14 days
